page.title: 15MY FUTURE
page.content:
Hello my name is Darren Bolt. I live in Bishops Itchington. On Wednesdays I go to{St. John's Ambulance Brigade} with my mate Kris Tarver. We go at 7 o'clock and finish at 8.OO p.m. The class is held in the{Parish Rooms,}and it is run by Mrs. Leeson.
In February, my mate and I passed our first{examination,}which was easy , because the examiner gave us simple questions about bandaging and what to do in an accident. The reason I started St. John's is because when I get older I want to be a{surgeon}and they will call me{Surgeon Bolt! }
